messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We need to set up solars and the engine, and I would really like to get mining some plasma cutters, so please prioritize those things.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Can any syndicate agents or traitors please come to the bridge, I would like to make a deal.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Escape Pod Four.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on energy emissions we detected, we believe that one of the station's pets has developed [REDACTED] level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.
